## `DisplayBarChartLabels`

Specifies whether to display labels above each bar in a bar chart\index{graphs!bar charts}.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
DisplayBarChartLabels(boolean display)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| `boolean` display | `true` to display the labels. |
:::
